div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2326 Cadiz, early 20th cent. Burial: 218-213 B.C. (Villaronga) Contents: 17+ AR Hispano-Punic: 1 didr.; 1 dr. (as Robin- son 2) 3 didr. (as R. 3) 3 didr. (as R. 7c, d, g) 1 dr. (as R. 7j) Gades: 1 hemidr.; 1 fr. Ebusus: 2 hemidr. Roman Rep.: 2 quadrig. Flans: 2 Disposition: unknown Villaronga, MHC (forthcoming)
